Parameters: View: The view building the outline.
Outline: The empty outline to be populated.
getOutline(android.view.View,android.gra.Description: Called to get the provider to populate the Outline. This method will be called by a View when its owned Drawables are invalidated, when the View's size changes, or if @B_android#view#View#invalidateOutline_E@ is called explicitly. The input outline is empty and has an alpha of 1.0f.
getOutline(android.view.View,android.gra.FullName: public abstract void getOutline (View view, Outline outline)

ClassDesc: Interface by which a View builds its @B_android#graphics#Outline_E@, used for shadow casting and clipping.
